title: Consolidated Statements of Earnings - USD ($)$ in Millions

null.label: Net sales
null.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

null.label: Cost of sales
null.definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

null.label: Gross margin
null.definition: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

Expenses:.label: Selling, general and administrative
Expenses:.definition: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Expenses:.label: Depreciation and amortization
Expenses:.definition: The current period expense charged against earnings on long-lived, physical assets not used in production, and which are not intended for resale, to allocate or recognize the cost of such assets over their useful lives; or to record the reduction in book value of an intangible asset over the benefit period of such asset; or to reflect consumption during the period of an asset that is not used in production.

Expenses:.label: Operating income
Expenses:.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Expenses:.label: Interest – net
Expenses:.definition: Amount of interest revenue (income derived from investments in debt securities and on cash and cash equivalents) net of interest expense (cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest).

Expenses:.label: Loss on extinguishment of debt
Expenses:.definition: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Expenses:.label: Pre-tax earnings
Expenses:.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Expenses:.label: Income tax provision
Expenses:.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Expenses:.label: Net earnings
Expenses:.definition: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

Expenses:.label: Basic earnings per common share (in dollars per share)
Expenses:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

Expenses:.label: Diluted earnings per common share (in dollars per share)
Expenses:.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

Expenses:.label: Net sales
Expenses:.definition: Revenue From Contract With Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax, Percentage

Expenses:.label: Cost of sales
Expenses:.definition: Cost of sales as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Gross margin
Expenses:.definition: Gross margin as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Selling, general and administrative
Expenses:.definition: Selling, general and administrative expense as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Depreciation and amortization
Expenses:.definition: Depreciation and amortization as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Operating income
Expenses:.definition: Operating income as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Interest – net
Expenses:.definition: Interest - net as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Loss on extinguishment of debt
Expenses:.definition: Gain (loss) on extinguishment of debt as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Pre-tax earnings
Expenses:.definition: Pre tax earnings as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Income tax provision
Expenses:.definition: Income tax provision as a percentage of net sales.

Expenses:.label: Net earnings
Expenses:.definition: Net earnings as a percentage of net sales.
